Hey guys, to fix the out of synch prob: 
1. Go to: http://www.free-codecs.com/avi_frame_rate_changer_download.htm and download the program.
2. Extract the program and run it.
3. Open the video file.
4. Adjust the frame rate to 25 fps.
5. Save
That's it!
